name: Homestyle Cottage Bread
instructions: In a bowl, combine warm water, sugar, and yeast. Let bloom for 5–10 minutes.
Stir in flour, salt, and softened butter. Knead until smooth.
Shape into a loaf, place into pan, and rise 30 minutes.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 28–32 minutes until golden and hollow-sounding.
